directions: Drain juice from pineapple. Set the fruit aside.  Dissolve the gelatin in the pineapple juice, and microwave for 1 minute.
Mix whipped topping and cream cheese until smooth.  Mix pineapple into creamed cheese mixture.  Stir in gelatin, and mix thoroughly.  Pour into pie shell, and refrigerate for 4 to 5 hours.
ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can crushed pineapple with juice
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Jim's Pineapple Cheese Pie
